sentences.sentence: The histopathological lesion is localized at these sites.
sentences.translation: 组织病理学损伤局限于这些部位。

sentences.sentence: Results The histopathological diagnosis was got in 24 cases (24/26).
sentences.translation: 结果24例病人获得了组织病理学诊断（ 24 /26 ）。

sentences.sentence: PURPOSE: to study the histopathological types of cysts of the parotid gland.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨腮腺囊肿的组织病理学特征。
